howItWorks.heroTitle: Meet Chayo, your digital business assistant who
howItWorks.subHeader: Transform your business journey with AI that understands your business needs

step1.title: Give Her Personality
step1.description: Define Chayo's vibe: professional, friendly, caring... You decide how she supports your business journey.
details: Unique personality for your business growth

step2.title: Train Her Knowledge
step2.description: Upload your business information and watch Chayo become an expert on your business growth needs.

step3.title: Connect Your Channels
step3.description: Deploy Chayo across WhatsApp, your phone, and other platforms for 24/7 business support.

step4.title: Watch Her Work
step4.description: Chayo handles your business support 24/7 while you focus on your business journey.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to Chayo AI ("we," "our," or "us"). We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our AI business automation platform.

personalInfo.title: Personal Information
items: Name and email address when you create an account
Profile information and business details
Payment information (processed securely through Stripe)
Communication preferences and settings

usageData.title: Usage Data
items: How you interact with our platform and AI agents
Conversation logs and chat history for service improvement
Technical data like IP address, browser type, and device information
Analytics data to improve our services

agreementToTerms.title: Agreement to Terms
agreementToTerms.content: By accessing and using Chayo AI ("the Service"), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

descriptionOfService.title: Description of Service
descriptionOfService.content: Chayo AI is an AI-powered business automation platform that provides intelligent chatbots and customer service automation tools. Our core service includes WhatsApp AI Agent functionality, with additional channels and features being developed and released over time.

userAccounts.title: User Accounts
items: You must be at least 18 years old to use this service
You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account
You must provide accurate and complete information when creating an account
You are responsible for all activities that occur under your account
You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account

acceptableUse.title: Acceptable Use
acceptableUse.description: You agree not to use the Service to:
items: Violate any laws or regulations
Harass, abuse, or harm others
Send spam or unsolicited communications
Distribute malware or harmful code
Infringe on intellectual property rights
Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems
Use the service for illegal or fraudulent activities

subscriptionAndBilling.title: Subscription and Billing
items: Subscription fees are billed in advance on a monthly or annual basis
All fees are non-refundable except as required by law
We may change our pricing with 30 days notice
Your subscription will automatically renew unless cancelled
You may cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings
Payment processing is handled securely through Stripe

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.description: The Service and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by Chayo AI and are protected by international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property laws.
items: You retain ownership of content you create using our platform
You grant us a license to use your content to provide the service
You may not copy, modify, or distribute our proprietary technology

privacyAndData.title: Privacy and Data
privacyAndData.description: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy, which also governs your use of the Service, to understand our practices regarding your personal data.
items: We collect and process data as described in our Privacy Policy
You are responsible for ensuring compliance with data protection laws
We implement security measures to protect your data

serviceAvailability.title: Service Availability
serviceAvailability.description: We strive to maintain high service availability but cannot guarantee 100% uptime. We may:
items: Perform scheduled maintenance with advance notice
Experience temporary outages due to technical issues
Update or modify features to improve the service
Suspend access for maintenance or security reasons

limitationOfLiability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.description: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Chayo AI shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from your use of the Service.

termination.title: Termination
termination.description: We may terminate or suspend your account and access to the Service at our sole discretion, without prior notice, for conduct that we believe violates these Terms or is harmful to other users, us, or third parties.
items: You may terminate your account at any time
Upon termination, your access to the Service will cease
We may retain certain data as required by law

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.description: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction where Chayo AI is incorporated, without regard to its conflict of law principles.

changesToTerms.title: Changes to Terms
changesToTerms.description: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will provide notice of material changes by posting the updated terms on our website and updating the "Last updated" date.

contactInformation.title: Contact Information
contactInformation.description: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:
